title.rendered: Eldorado Stone on the TODAY Show with Meredith Vieira

content.rendered:
With winter right around the corner, the TODAY Show featured a segment on ‘How to update your fireplace,’ and of course, Eldorado Stone provided the perfect product for the segment! Eldorado Stone was the featured highlight with a hearth as the backdrop for Meredith Vieira and designer, George Oliphant. The segment shared some great ideas for updating that old fire place. Our favorite? The architectural stone veneer, of course!

 

Download PDF
